content:
There are many online stores where you can buy yoga blocks and straps. Here are some popular options:

1. **Amazon**: Amazon offers a wide selection of yoga blocks and straps from various brands, often with fast shipping and competitive pricing.
2. **Lululemon**: Lululemon's online store offers a range of yoga blocks and straps, including their own branded products and other popular brands.
3. **Manduka**: Manduka's online store sells their own high-quality yoga blocks and straps, as well as other yoga accessories.
4. **Gaiam**: Gaiam's online store offers a variety of yoga blocks and straps, including eco-friendly and sustainable options.
5. **YogaAccessories**: YogaAccessories.com specializes in yoga props, including blocks, straps, and more. They often have a wide selection and competitive pricing.
6. **REI**: REI (Recreational Equipment Inc.) sells yoga blocks and straps from various brands, often with a focus on outdoor and eco-friendly options.
7. **eBay**: eBay is a great place to find deals on yoga blocks and straps from various sellers, including new and used options.
8. **YogaOutlet**: YogaOutlet.com offers discounted prices on yoga blocks, straps, and other yoga accessories from various brands.
9. **ProYoga**: ProYoga.com sells a range of yoga blocks and straps, including high-quality and eco-friendly options.
10. **Etsy**: Etsy is a great place to find handmade or unique yoga blocks and straps from independent sellers.

When shopping online, make sure to read reviews, check the product description, and look for any certifications (e.g., eco-friendly or sustainable materials). This will help you find the best yoga blocks and straps for your practice.

Happy shopping, and I hope you find the perfect yoga blocks and straps to enhance your practice!
